name: Club Girl
description:
Club Girl - You only need 4 keys (arrows), try to go through 10 levels, 10 different speeds, with each level the speed gets faster, one card (disco club), 10 different club soundtracks.
A classic game, you need to press the arrow keys on your keyboard in time to earn points. Explosive soundtracks, explosive arrows, explosive combinations! Try it too!

Features:

  • Lots of animations
  • Dynamic multi-angle camera
  • 10 speeds (with each level the speed gets faster)
  • 10 club soundtracks
